mapper.delete: delete from fm_room_users where userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and groupId = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update fm_room_users set userRemark=#{userRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and groupId = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into fm_room_users (mainId, userName, groupId, startDate, userRemark) values (#{mainid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{userRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
